text:
Palo Alto, CA - UI Designer / Graphic Designer / Game Artist

Tangible Play is looking for a UI/Graphics Designer/Artist to help us make more games for Osmo (playosmo.com), a digitally augmented table top game experienced for kids.

We just shipped our first batch of pre-orders and are ramping up manufacturing for our holiday release.

We are also actively working on new games for Osmo.

If you are interested send me a link to your portfolio/work.

pohung@tangibleplay.com
